value.name: Fort Collins' Citizen Review Board sides with police in most use of force cases. They say that's good.

value.name: Pritzker responds to report convicted felon cashed in on state’s COVID-19 spending
value.description: Governor JB Pritzker responded Thursday after WGN Investigates revealed a convicted felon cashed in on the state’s Covid crisis, despite the state’s rules against doing business with felons. John Thomas went to prison for defrauding suburban Riverdale on a marina project.
